FuncDef: This command creates or edits a BFD template. A BFD template defines the set of configurable parameters used by a BFD session. These include the transmit and receive timers used for BFD CC packets, the transmit timer interval used when the session is providing a CV function, the multiplier value, the echo-receive interval, and whether the BFD session terminates in the CPM network processor.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies a text string name for the template up to 32 characters in printable 7-bit ASCII, enclosed in double quotes.
